trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Przedstawia <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> typów do automatyzacji interfejsu użytkownika.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" /> class.
Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera typ kontrolki dla <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> representing the bounding rectangle of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> reprezentujący prostokąt ograniczający <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that represents the screen coordinates of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />.
Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera nazwę <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the word "Window".
Gets the text label of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera etykiety tekstowej <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />, or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> if the name is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Ciąg, który zawiera <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name" /> lub <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name" /> z <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />, lub <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> Jeśli nazwa jest <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to.
trans-unit.target: Właściwość name można traktować jako ciąg tekstowy, który użytkownik użyje, aby wyjaśnić, jest określana kontroli.

trans-unit.source: It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: Ważne jest, aby mieć reprezentacji tekstowej dla wszystkich kontrolek w [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] , dzięki czemu można programowo odwołać się do formantu w sposób zlokalizowane.
